mapper.select: select notiNum, notiSendUser, notiRecvUser, date_format(notiSendTime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') notiSendTime, notiContent, notiReadChk from notification where notiRecvUser=#{notiRecvUser} order by notiNum desc
select count(notiNum) from notification where notiRecvUser=#{username} and notiReadChk=0
mapper.update: update notification set notiReadChk=1 where notiReadChk=0 and notiRecvUser=#{username}
